description:
If you're looking for sunglasses that blend fashion, comfort, and advanced technology, the Ryders Eyewear Anzana Sunglasses might be the ticket. Crafted for those who prioritize both eye protection and improved vision, these sunglasses represent an impressive upgrade from the well-loved Coco frame.

  • They feature an expanded and more curved lens design, optimizing both your frontal and peripheral vision while effectively shielding your eyes from harmful UV rays and glare
  • Crafted from impact-resistant and scratch-resistant polycarbonate, the lens also boasts anti-fog and hydrophobic coatings, preventing condensation and repelling water, oil, and dirt
  • The sleek frame, constructed from lightweight, flexible, and durable TR90 thermoplastic, offers a secure and comfortable fit with rubber nose pads and temple tips
  • Suitable for medium-large face sizes
name: Ryders Eyewear Anzana Sunglasses - Unisex
